subject: Order #SSN1956
description_text:
Hi,

My prox ultra stop working It randomly gives input that make unplayable
everyone game. I tried to reset, change USB, uninstall drivers, change USB
Port and cable but nothing works.



Il ven 25 lug 2025, 18:58 SIMSONN <no-reply@loox.io> ha scritto:

> Hello Alessandro, We would be grateful if you shared how things look and
> feel. Your review helps us and the community that supports us, and it only
> takes a few
> seconds. ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌

conversations.body_text: Hi Alessandro Vandini,  Please use the test version 2.1.1, click Revert → Save, and then recalibrate and test again. If the issue persists, you may try refreshing the firmware manually: go to Settings → Update → Manual Firmware Update → pedals-firmware-proxultra.sfu to upgrade. For now, please avoid using version 2.1.0—we will release an online update soon.            https://drive.google.com/file/d/1UPkeOHREyALtCtNmL87a2WnUDZV0Gx_b/view?usp=drive_link

Thanks, first solution to go 2.1.1 is not working, same problem.

Where can i find the firmware file?

Thanks

Il giorno mer 20 ago 2025 alle ore 15:50 service@simsonn.com <
service@simsonn.com> ha scritto:

> Hi Alessandro Vandini,
>
> Please use the test version *2.1.1*, click *Revert → Save*, and then
> recalibrate and test again.
> If the issue persists, you may try refreshing the firmware manually: go to *Settings
> → Update → Manual Firmware Update → pedals-firmware-proxultra.sfu* to
> upgrade.
> For now, please avoid using *version 2.1.0*—we will release an online
> update soon.
>
>
>
> https://drive.google.com/file/d/1UPkeOHREyALtCtNmL87a2WnUDZV0Gx_b/view?usp=drive_link
>
> On Tue, 19 Aug at 12:47 PM , Alessandro Vandini <alessandro7006@gmail.com>
> wrote:
> Hi,
>
> My prox ultra stop working It randomly gives input that make unplayable
> everyone game. I tried to reset, change USB, uninstall drivers, change USB
> Port and cable but nothing works.
>
>
>
> Il ven 25 lug 2025, 18:58 SIMSONN <no-reply@loox.io> ha scritto:
>
>> Hello Alessandro, We would be grateful if you shared how things look and
>> feel. Your review helps us and the community that supports us, and it only
>> takes a few
>> seconds. ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌
